name: com.uralstech.ugemini
description:
UGemini: A Unity C# wrapper for the Google Gemini API.

If you've just updated UGemini, it is recommended to check out the releases page (https://github.com/Uralstech/UGemini/releases) for information on breaking changes for each update.

samples.description: A sample scene showing a multi-turn chat system.
A sample scene showing a function calling system.
A sample showing a system which streams Gemini's responses, including function calls.
A sample scene with a system to create, delete, retrieve, list and prompt Gemini with files stored in the File/Media API endpoints.
A sample scene with a system where Gemini answers questions based only on the given context.
A sample scene showing a system where Gemini responds in a specified JSON format.
A sample scene with a system to list, get and chat with models using the models.get and models.list endpoints.
A sample scene showing a token counting system using the "countTokens" endpoint.
